Starshine upon the People.name: Starshine upon the People
Starshine upon the People.flavor: You summon a shower of glittering stardust that drifts down over your allies, reinvigorating them and heartening them for the battle.
Starshine upon the People.effect: The targets can spend a healing surge and immediately make a saving throw against one condition affecting them that a save can end. In addition, eladrin, elves, and half-elves affected by the power gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.
